Good morning, this is Chiranjivi Chakraborty , an equities reporter in Mumbai. Indian equities look set for another bumpy ride, taking cues from the rough session on Wall Street overnight and a sluggish mood across Asian markets. Nifty futures are already trading lower. With risk-off vibes in play, investors seem to be cozying up to safer bets — consumer stocks will likely see some action, especially as the two-day meeting of GST Council to discuss the planned tax cuts keeps them in the spotlight.
